TopicTitle: [1.12.5] Kcalbeloh System Planet Pack (v1.1.7) - A journey to a black hole (April 9, 2024)

Articles.Content:
I think that's the best mod to add other solar systems. Also it's compatible with exactly the right mods. 

Are there Plans to add easteregss too? That would be the last bit to make it perfect.
